description: This table stores information about communication records that are linked to task records.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REFERENCED_TASK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record referenced by the communication record.
